testcase.classname: Application Test - Add products to wishlist
testcase.name: Verify_Customer_Add_The_Product_In_Wishlist_And_Add_To_Cart_TC_001
testcase.system-out: Given I add "4" different products to my wishlist...........................passed When I view my wishlist table...............................................passed Then I find total "4" selected items in my wishlist.........................passed When I search for "lowest" price product....................................passed And I am able to add the "lowest" price item to my cart.....................passed Then I am able to verify the item in my cart................................passed
